about_the_game:
DecayZ Origin is built with Unreal Engine 4 and will expand throughout the Early Access period

Prologue:

In the remote mountains of Thailand, a top-secret government laboratory becomes ground zero for a deadly virus that spreads with the ferocity of a wildfire. As the virus ravages the surrounding villages, the government imposes martial law, but it's too late. The virus claims thousands of lives in just one week, leaving no hope for a cure or vaccine.

As the infected slowly die and rise again as mutations, the government keeps their disappearance under wraps, and the project is abandoned, forgotten, and left to the virus's mercy.

However, 20 years later, the virus has spread beyond the isolated mountains, and the world is gripped in a pandemic that leaves no hope. The government, desperate for a cure, seeks foreign aid and dispatches a first expedition team to contain the outbreak, but they disappear without a trace. The second expedition team is sent in to find the source of the virus. However, as the team ventures back into the mountains, they realize that the virus has evolved, adapted, and become far more terrifying than anyone ever imagined. What they find there will test their will to survive and may mean the end of humanity as we know it.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600 (3.3Ghz) or AMD Ryzen 5 1400 (3.2Ghz)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 560 with 4GB VRAM ／ NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti with 4GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8700 (3.2Ghz) or AMD Ryzen 5 3600 (3.6 Ghz)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 1080 Ti or AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT or INTEL Arc A770
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
